name: Bewitching Cafe V1.2
description:
In a town run by animals, one magical cat has inherited their family business, a café protecting a society of witches. Life starts to get difficult when witch hunters discover their shop. Help Cat protect their family and their business as you fight back the hunters. 

03/03/2023 Update: Added more orders, fixed up the brewing mechanic and spawning potions, added background music and sfx, added vfx, altered the spellbook, changed fonts to be more legible, removed names on inventory.
